document_data.name: Byron Cymrych I
document_data.mainbody: '''Byron Cymrych I''' was High King of the [[Moonshae Isles]] at the turn of the 9{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dragon/362/Grand History of the Realms: The Moonshaes|33}}
document_data.Relationships: He was a member of the [[Cymrych Dynasty]] and the son of his predecessor, High King [[Ardan Cymrych|Ardan]]. His successor was his first son, [[Kevan Cymrych]].
document_data.History:
Byron I assumed the throne of the High King in the {{YearlinkName|796}}, after the death of his father.

In [[818 DR|the twenty-second year of his reign]], Byron I fell into a [[magic]]al sleep that lasted into [[819 DR|the following year]]. During this period, his son and heir, Kevan, ruled in his stead. 

Byron I ruled for thirty years before he died of natural causes in the {{YearlinkName|826}}.
